description: Butterfly Weed (Asclepias tuberosa 'Hello Yellow') is an amazing and vibrant plant species. It produces cheerful, bright yellow clusters of blooms throughout the summer season. Not only is it pleasing to the eye, but it is extremely beneficial to the environment. Butterfly Weed attracts many pollinators to the garden thanks to its sweet nectar, providing them with a vital source of food. Additionally, it is deer resistant, making it a great addition to any landscape. With its vivid blossoms, easy maintenance, and hardiness, 'Hello Yellow' Butterfly Weed is a welcomed addition to gardens that will bring many benefits.
